<section>
<para>
<partintro>
  <para>This chapter focuses on how to manage, store, preserve, and deliver content, and more, via the following main topics:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Organize_Content.Structure_Content">Structure content</link>
          </emphasis> introduces types of drives and views, functions on action tabs, actions on folders and documents, and content administration.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Organize_Content.Manage_Content">Manage content</link>
          </emphasis> shows how to contribute content, and to manage content (for example, creating/editing/publishing/deleting content).</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Organize_Content.Newsletter">Manage newsletters</link>
          </emphasis> includes information of newsletter viewer and newsletter manager, and actions which can be done on the newsletter manager.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Organize_Content.Manage_Workflows">Manage workflows</link>
          </emphasis> represents default processes, including holiday and pay raise, and how to create and manage these processes. Also, this section also focuses on how to upload or view details of a process.</para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
</partintro>
</para>
</section>
